question: The "Sierra de Bahoruco National Park" is located in which country?
explanation: The Sierra de Bahoruco National Park is located in the island country of the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of the Greater Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region. This national park is bordered by Lake Enriquillo and Jaragua National Park. This national park includes Baoruco Mountain Range, various endemic and threatened bird species such as Bay-breasted cuckoos, Hispaniolan amazon, stygian owls and sharp-skinned hawks.
